channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Paul C. Lambert

item.title: A new webpage
item.description:
I have had to move my webpage as the my university was closing down the server where the last one was hosted. I used this “opportunity” to create a new webpage using the excellent guide provided here and some advice from Michael Crowther who has recently started his new website.

This is my first ever blog and at the moment I am unsure how often I will do this.

Software Questions

Sometimes…
